name: ATOC IDL seminar
body:
### Coordinates
2015 January 29  
9:30 am - 12:15 pm  
D318 DUAN

### Instructor  
Mark Piper (mark.piper@colorado.edu)

**Special Guests:**  
Chris Torrence and Dain Cilke  
Exelis VIS

### Agenda
1. Why IDL?
1. IDL Help
1. The command line and the Workbench
1. Data types, data structures, and control statements
1. Graphics
1. An in-depth example

### Schedule
| When? | What? |
| -----------: | :------ |
| 9:30 - 10:45 | Mostly lecture, with short examples |
|10:45 - 11:00 | Break |
|11:00 - 12:15 | Dissection of in-depth example |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
